title: LSD: insight or insanity?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse

description: Explains the physiological and psychological effect that can result from the unsupervised use of LSD. Touches on the history of hallucinogenic chemicals, the use of LSD and its effects, and the risks of taking LSD. Narrated by Sal Mineo.
